summary: Sweet suburban teen Amanda is introduced by her new friends to prescription drug-sharing, but the recreational fun soon leads her to a life-altering heroin addiction.
cast: Bella Thorne|Daniela Bobadilla|Israel Broussard|Ross Butler|Jasmine Sky Sarin|Matreya Fedor|Peter Benson|Venus Terzo|Ryan Grantham|Lucia Walters|Aren Buchholz|Patrick Sabongui|Cassidy Alexa|Michael Bean|Kelt Eccleston|Diane Verhiel|Conni Attwell|Josh Kalender|Denis Corbett|Yolanda Corbett|Aisling Goodman|Parris JuRay
title: Perfect High
